rct_messages.msg:
Sorry. You are not eligible to participate in this programme. If you know a South African parent that might enjoy ParentText, you can send them this link to join: 
{share link}
rct_messages.metadata.description: when a user that is not eligible for the study sends a message to the chatbot
when a user that expires during baseline sends a message with "1" (or anything else) and starts the baseline from where they left

rct_messages.msg: It looks like this is not a good time. Please type 1 if you'd like to continue.
You will continue with your progress tomorrow.
üéâ You've been selected to receive ParentText. Let's get started:
üéâ You've been selected to receive WASHText. Let's get started:
You can invite your family and friends to join the study and earn airtime, too! Just share this link with them: {rct link}

It looks like you‚Äôre not interested in the Child Development course right now. If you want to join the Child Development course later, just press 1. üìö

Remember, you can still take the 3-month survey and get R75 airtime, even if you don‚Äôt do the course. üéÅ

üëÄ Oops! You've timed out. If you want to rejoin ParentText, press 1. 

üîë You will receive the opportunity to participate in the 3 month survey, and receive R75 airtime, whether or not you complete ParentText.

rct_consent_data.msg:
‚úÖParticipating in this study is optional. 
‚úÖ Your personal information is safe and private. 
‚úÖYour name and information will not be public, but your responses will be kept and used by researchers to learn how to support families like yours. 
‚úÖThe information you share may also be combined with other families‚Äô experiences so that we can understand how these programs work across the world. 
‚ùåYou can stop when you want. Just type {STOP}
Press YES if you have read and understand the above document, agree with the messages. and give consent to participate in the study. Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
rct_consent_data.metadata.description:
YES needs to be consistent with "yes_option"
EXIT needs to be consistent with "exit_option"

rct_consent_data.msg: Great! Let's start your first survey.
Are you sure you want to exit the study?
You've been removed from the study, but it isn't too late to improve your relationship with your child! Would you like to receive ParentText, a 5 day programme delivered on WhatsApp from this number?
Great! Your ParentText journey starts now!

rct_interaction_data.question:
ü•≥ It's time for your 2nd survey. This survey contains about 25 questions. You will receive R50 airtime for participating. Are you ready to get started? 

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. No

ü•≥ It's time for your last survey.  If you complete the survey, you will receive R75 airtime. Are you ready to get started? 

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. No

rct_booster_offer.question:
üå± Grow Together! üå±

Your child is growing up fast! Learn more with our easy 5-day course on child development in ParentText. Just 5 minutes each day. Earn a certificate when you finish! Want to start? Reply "Yes" now!
rct_booster_offer.options.2.stop_message:
That's okay! You can easily access the Child Development course any time you want via the main menu. Just type {MENU} to access it. 

üîë You can still join the next survey, and receive R75 airtime, regardless of whether or not you complete ParentText.

rct_booster_offer.question:
üëè You're doing an amazing job learning how to improve your relationship with your child! üëè

üåü ParentText now has a new 5-day course on understanding and helping your child's development. üåü

Would you like to keep working towards your current certificate on improving your relationship, or start the new course on child development? Reply "Relationship" or "Development" to choose!
rct_booster_offer.options.1.stop_message:
Great! Let's keep going with your current course. 

üîë  Once you finish, you'll be able to start the Child Development course. Keep up the good work!

prescreen_questions.excluded_values: No, I do not live in South Africa

prescreen_questions.options.2.text: No, I do not live in South Africa

Are you under the age of 18?

prescreen_questions.question: Are you parent or caregiver of a child aged 2 to 17 years?
prescreen_questions.confirm_question: Sorry. You need to be the parent or caregiver of a child aged 2 to 17 to qualify for this study. Please confirm: Do you have a child between 2 and 17?
prescreen_questions.stop_message: Sorry. You do not qualify for the study. Thank you for your time.

prescreen_intros.msg:
ü•≥ Welcome to our study! If you decide to join, you will be invited to complete 3 surveys. 

üå± The surveys will ask you questions about your life and your relationship with your child. 

‚úèÔ∏è After completing the first survey, you will receive R25 airtime. 

üí¨ You will then be invited to receive messages on WhatsApp from this number about parenting or hygiene. 

‚úèÔ∏è A month later you will be asked to complete a 2nd survey after which you will receive R50 airtime. 

‚úèÔ∏è Three months later, you will receive a 3rd survey. You will receive R75 airtime after completing that final survey. 

üì≤ The money will be sent to a phone number of your choice as mobile money or talk time, depending on your mobile operator requirements.
üéâüéâ Congratulations, you qualify for this study.

baseline_intros.msg:
‚úèÔ∏è You will receive R25 airtime for participating in this survey. 

üì≤ We will send airtime to the South African phone number of your choice.

üíõ To begin, we would like to ask a few questions about you and your family. It is important that you are honest so we can help families like yours. 
  
ü§ê Remember that your name and answers to these questions will be kept private. If there are any questions that you feel uncomfortable answering, you do not have to answer them.
The first questions are about you.

1Ô∏è‚É£ We are now going ask you to select one of your children to be part of the study.

üßíüèæ This child should be between 2 and 17 years old.

If you have more than one child between the ages of 2 and 17, please choose the child whose behaviour is most difficult for you to manage.
‚ôø Sometimes we experience difficulties with hearing, seeing, communicating, or moving.

üòî There are days in our lives when we feel sad and down. 

Sometimes it's because things don't go as planned. 
Sometimes it's because something bad happened. 
Sometimes it is because we are too stressed. 

üíö Some of these questions are difficult to answer so please try your best. 
üíö There are no right or wrong answers.
Now, we have two final questions to ask you.

ü•≥ You have completed the survey! Thank you very much for your participation. As a token of appreciation, you will receive R25 airtime. 

üìÖ We will follow up with similar questions in one month, and once you've completed this survey, you will receive an additional R50 airtime. 

üáøüá¶ üíõ Your valuable input will help us better understand the challenges and experiences of parents in South Africa. Thank you for your time!

What is Your Child's date of birth?

1_month_multiple_choice.question: How often in the past week did you praise Your {Age Group} when they behaved well?
How often in the past week did you play with Your {Age Group} or do other fun things?
How often in the past week did you help Your {Age Group} with their school work in any way you could?
How often in the past week did you commend Your Teen for working hard at school?
How often in the past week did you read books to or look at picture books with Your Child?
How often in the past week did you name, count, or draw things with Your Child?
How often in the past week did you actively participate in activities with Your {Age Group}, such as playing, sharing books, or helping with schoolwork?
How often in the past week did Your {Age Group}'s father or male caregiver actively participate in activities with Your Child, such as playing, sharing books, or helping with schoolwork?
How often in the past week did you know what Your Teen was doing when they were using the internet, cellphone, or other device?
How often in the past week was Your Child at home without adult supervision?
How often in the past week were you involved in decision-making processes regarding Your {Age Group}'s education, health, and overall well-being?
How often in the past week was Your {Age Group}'s father or male caregiver involved in decision-making processes regarding Your {Age Group}'s education, health, and overall well-being?
How often in the past week did you and your partner share housework and caregiving tasks equally?
1_month_multiple_choice.options.6.text: I do not have a partner in my home
1_month_multiple_choice.options.6.value: I do not have a partner in my home

1_month_multiple_choice.question: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious or on edge?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things?
How often in the past week did Your {Age Group} show no interest, not even in pleasant things?
How often in the past week did Your {Age Group} either not obey you or it was difficult to make them obey you?
How often in the past week did Your {Age Group} let you know what is bothering them?
How often in the past week could you talk about personal things with Your Teen, like boyfriends, girlfriends, or sexual behaviour?
How often in the past week did you talk to Your Teen about their use of the internet or device?
How many times in the past week has Your Teen been out with friends and ended up walking home alone in the dark?
Have you talked to Your Teen in the past week about keeping safe from risky situations such as sexual violence in the past week?

In the past month, have any of these things happened to Your Teen? 

* Touched in a sexual way when they did not want to be touched
* Shown something sexual that they didn‚Äôt want to see
* Made to do anything sexual they didn‚Äôt want to do
* Felt that they had to have a boyfriend or girlfriend because of advice they were being given by someone
How often in the past week did you wash your hands after going to the toilet, after cleaning a child, before preparing food, before feeding a child, and before eating?
How helpful were the chatbot mesages to you and your family?
How many times in the past week did you try to speak calmly with Your {Age Group} when you were upset with them?
How many times in the past week did you discipline Your {Age Group} physically, such as hitting with your hand, belt, or another object?
How many times in the past week did you shout or scream at Your {Age Group}?
How many times in the past week did you threaten to hit or hurt Your {Age Group}?

1_month_intros.msg:
Thank you very much for taking part in this survey! 

üáøüá¶ üíõ Your participation in this study will help us learn how we can support other parents like you in South Africa. 

ü•≥ You will receive R50 airtime for participating in this survey. 

ü§´ Remember that your name and answers to these questions will be kept private. 

ü§ê If there are any questions that you feel uncomfortable answering, you do not have to answer them. 

ü§ó Please try to answer the questions as honestly as you can.
üå± We would like to ask you a few questions regarding your relationship with Your {Age Group}.
üòá All adults use certain methods to teach children the right behaviour or to stop them from behaving badly.

üòî There are days in our lives when we feel sad and down. 

Sometimes it's because things don't go as planned. 
Sometimes it's because something bad happened. 
Sometimes it is because we are too stressed. 

üíö Some of these questions are difficult to answer so please try your best. 
üíö There are no right or wrong answers.
üíö The following questions are about Your {Age Group}, their behaviour, and their communication with you.
‚úÖ Now, we will ask you a question about your life in general.
üéâ This is the last question we have for you today!

üéâüéâ You have completed the survey! Thank you very much for your participation. As a token of appreciation, you will receive R50 airtime. 

üìÖ We will follow up with similar questions in two months, and once you've completed this final survey, you will receive an additional R75 airtime. 

üáøüá¶ üíõ Your valuable input will help us better understand the challenges and experiences of parents in South Africa. Thank you for your time!

3_month_multiple_choice.question: How helpful was the chatbot in helping you support your child's development and wellbeing?
We would love to know more about what you think! Would it be okay for a member of our research team to get in touch to ask you further questions about your experience with the chatbot?

3_month_intros.msg:
Thank you very much for taking part in this survey! 

üáøüá¶ üíõ Your participation in this study will help us learn how we can support other parents like you in South Africa. 

üéâ You will receive R75 airtime for participating in this survey. 

ü§´ Remember that your name and answers to these questions will be kept private. 

ü§ê If there are any questions that you feel uncomfortable answering, you do not have to answer them. 

ü§ó Please try to answer the questions as honestly as you can.

üéâüéâ You are done! üéâüéâ

üíô Thank you very much for completing this final survey. 

ü•≥ You will now receive R75 airtime as a token of appreciation. 

üíö We appreciate the time you took to answer these questions!

send_dtone_airtime_data.msg: Your airtime of R @results.amount will be sent to @fields.internation_phone_number. Please allow up to 24 hours for the payment to process.

If you have not received your airtime in 24 hours, please send a message to {support_phone_number} with your transaction ID.
Your transaction ID is: @results.transaction_id
This transaction has failed. Please send a message to {support_phone_number} with this reference number: @fields.research_id

send_dtone_airtime_data.metadata.description: for handling users added to wrong number group for surveys 1 month and 3 month

input_phone_number_south_africa_data.msg: All survey payments must be sent to the same phone number. Please enter a 10-digit South African phone number that you would like to send airtime to. For example, you would enter 083 283 8620 as 0832838620.
South African phone numbers should begin with the number zero, please enter a ten-digit phone number beginning with the number zero.
You did not enter a 10-digit phone number, please try again.
Invalid entry, please enter a ten-digit phone number, beginning with the number zero.

NOT USED: confirm_phone_number_data.msg: Your saved phone number is @results.phone_number. Do you want to send airtime to this number or a different number?

safeguarding_stop_survey_data.msg:
If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "EXIT".

If you made a mistake, please type "BACK".
safeguarding_stop_survey_data.metadata.description:
BACK needs to be consistent with "back_option"
EXIT needs to be consistent with "leave_option"
needs to be consistent with "confirm" message
needs to be consistent with "confirm" message

safeguarding_stop_survey_data.msg:
Thank you for participating. If you want to return to the programme, type HELLO. 

We hope to see you again soon!
safeguarding_stop_survey_data.metadata.description: HELLO is just to suggest something to type, but anything typed in the chat will trigger the same behaviour
